appDesc.message: Auto sign-in for Endfield official website daily

backgroundInfoText.message: When the browser is open, a new tab will be opened for sign-in. When the browser is closed, it will launch the browser to sign in. Both run in the background without interrupting your other activities.

backgroundPermissionText.message: ⚠️ Remember to enable "Continue running background apps" permission in your browser for the auto-launch feature to work.

backgroundSettingsPath.message: Chrome: [Settings] > [System] > [Continue running background apps when Google Chrome is closed]
